AZURE_SIGNALR_CONNECTION_STRING: OPTIONAL: Azure SignalR Service connection string for WebSocket scaling
AZURE_COMMUNICATION_CONNECTION_STRING: OPTIONAL: Azure Communication Services connection string for email delivery
AZURE_REDIS_CONNECTION_STRING: OPTIONAL: Azure Redis Cache connection string for session management
AZURE_SERVICE_BUS_CONNECTION_STRING: OPTIONAL: Azure Service Bus connection string for message queuing
AZURE_COMMUNICATION_SENDER_EMAIL: OPTIONAL: Sender email address for Azure Communication Services
SECRET_KEY: REQUIRED: Flask secret key for session security
OPENAI_API_KEY: OPTIONAL: OpenAI API key for AI features
AI_MODEL: OPTIONAL: AI model to use (default: gpt-4o, options: gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4-turbo, gpt-3.5-turbo)
APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY: OPTIONAL: Application Insights instrumentation key for monitoring
CUSTOM_DOMAIN: OPTIONAL: Custom domain name if using one
